name: Fixer
description: The Fixer is a Medium humanoid clad in leather armor, displaying agility through its dexterity. With a composed demeanor, it seems knowledgeable in various techniques and magical abilities.
memorable: The Fixer's ability to conceal itself and allies from magical scrutiny is particularly noteworthy, making it a formidable presence in strategic encounters.
goals: To protect allies, influence the battlefield, and maintain secrecy through magical means.
relations: Could be found alongside other stealthy or supportive allies, working in tandem with rogues or spellcasters.
environment: Often found in urban settings or areas requiring subterfuge and support roles.
strengths: Notable skills in stealth and perception, along with the ability to perform a powerful cleansing ritual.
weaknesses: Average durability and melee combat abilities, with low strength and no formidable offensive capabilities.
attacks: Utilizes dual weapon attacks with shortswords or a sling, combining piercing damage with poison.
most_powerful_ability: The Ritual Cleansing ability effectively renders an area immune to divination magic for an extended period.
equipment: Wields shortswords and can operate a hand crossbow.
senses: Passive perception of 14 allows it to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in perception, enhancing its ability to notice stealthy or hidden creatures.
additional_information: Can cast prestidigitation and unseen servant spells at will for added utility.
Practices strategic gameplay, often positioning itself to benefit allies.
Known for using tools and techniques to influence battlefield dynamics.
Engages in deception and stealth, acting as a scout or infiltrator.
Balancing offensive and defensive capabilities while primarily supporting allies.
spellcasting: Has the ability to cast minor spells that provide utility in various situations.
test_queries: fixer that conceals from divination magic
agile support character with poison weapons
humanoid skilled in stealth and perception
